name: Monster Truck Road Trip
description:
Fasten Your Seat Belts and Get Ready for the Exciting Hill Road Racing Adventure with Monster Trucks and Experience the Fun of Driving Full Metal EPS Crusher on Road Rampage!

Your rivals have access to the same extreme trucks, Obliterate Your Rivals and WIN THE RACE!

You must carefully maneuver around Challenging Race Tracks.

Watch out for the sharp turns or you will fall behind. The Track is ready to be conquered! Drive the Speed truck and race over dangerous mountain roads in this extreme simulator. Drive your truck as fast as you dare over the WINDING and TWISTING ROADS

The challenge lies in racing to beat your rivals and in navigating over roughest roads in this truck racing simulator.

Get your truck racing skills into gear, start your engines and race like the wind in this fast-paced truck racing adventure!

GAME FEATURES :

- Choose Your Truck
- Stunning 3D Views
- Realistic Controls
- 4 Challenging Race Environments
- Enjoyable and Addictive Game

GAME PLAY AND GRAPHICS :

- Realistic Speed Truck Racing Environment
- Intuitive and Easy-to-use Controls
- Dynamic Racing 3D Adventure
